title: U.S. Senator Takes Stride Towards Crypto-Friendly Regulation Amid SEC Lawsuits
description: Washington D.C., June 11, 2023 – In a groundbreaking move that has garnered applause from the broader crypto community, U.S. Senator Cynthia Lummis has pledged to bring crypto-friendly regulation to the forefront with a bipartisan bill. This legislative endeavor spearheaded alongside Senator Kirsten Gillibrand, aims to establish a comprehensive regulatory framework for digital assets within ... Read more
